pages.page: THE ATHLETE’S HEADPHONE Music can drive you to higher levels of performance. Designed for the athlete with slim design and strong, sweat-proof materials, the wireless iSport Achieve stays fully secure, even during intese activities. • 5+ Hour Battery • High Sound Isolation to focus on your workout without distractions • SecureFitTM SportClipTM stays in your ear • ControlTalk microphone for hands free calling and music control • Durable and sweat-proof 5+ Hour Battery #MAKEITHAPPEN Monster SecureFitTM SportclipTM Also Included: x3 Eartips Durable and Sweat-proof Follow us @MonsterProducts FOLLOW US @MONSTERPRODUCTS Available Colors WIRELESS
